name: $planned
desc: The charge item is ready for billing.

name: $billable
desc: The charge item has been determined to be not billable (e.g. due to rules associated with the billing code).

name: $not-billable
desc: The processing of the charge was aborted.

name: $aborted
desc: The charge item has been billed (e.g. a billing engine has generated financial transactions by applying the associated ruled for the charge item to the context of the Encounter, and placed them into Claims/Invoices.

name: $billed
desc: The charge item has been entered in error and should not be processed for billing.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: The authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this charge item  Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just not known which one.
